mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tp_agent_deal (PERSON_ID, AG_ID, DEAL_TIME, AG_TITLE, AG_TYPE, AG_SCOPE, AG_FROM, AG_FROM_NAME, AG_TO, AG_TO_NAME, AG_CONTEXT, MODULE_ID, MODULE_TYPE, ACTIVED, EXTEND01, EXTEND02, EXTEND03, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATOR) VALUES (#{personId}, #{agId}, #{dealTime}, #{agTitle}, #{agType}, #{agScope}, #{agFrom}, #{agFromName}, #{agTo}, #{agToName}, #{agContext}, #{moduleId}, #{moduleType}, #{actived}, #{extend01}, #{extend02}, #{extend03}, #{createTime}, #{creator}, #{updateTime}, #{updator})
mapper.select: SELECT PERSON_ID, AG_ID, DEAL_TIME, AG_TITLE, AG_TYPE, AG_SCOPE, AG_FROM, AG_FROM_NAME, AG_TO, AG_TO_NAME, AG_CONTEXT, MODULE_ID, MODULE_TYPE, ACTIVED, EXTEND01, EXTEND02, EXTEND03, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATOR FROM tp_agent_deal WHERE ACTIVED = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_TIME desc

SELECT PERSON_ID, AG_ID, DEAL_TIME, AG_TITLE, AG_TYPE, AG_SCOPE, AG_FROM, AG_FROM_NAME, AG_TO, AG_TO_NAME, AG_CONTEXT, MODULE_ID, MODULE_TYPE, ACTIVED, EXTEND01, EXTEND02, EXTEND03, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATOR FROM tp_agent_deal WHERE ACTIVED = 1 and PERSON_ID = #{personId} and AG_ID = #{agId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tp_agent_deal SET ACTIVED = 0 WHERE PERSON_ID = #{personId}
